#include <stdio.h>

int num_carry_ops(unsigned int a, unsigned int b)
{
  int i, carry, carry_ops;
  carry = 0;
  carry_ops = 0;

  while ((a > 0) && (b > 0)) {
    if (((a % 10) + (b % 10) + carry) > 9) {
      carry_ops++;
      carry = 1;
    } else {
      carry = 0;
    }
    a = a / 10;
    b = b / 10;
  }

  return carry_ops;
}

void print_output(int output[])
{
  int i;

  i = 0;
  while (output[i] != -1) {
    if (output[i] == 0)
      printf("No carry operation.\n");
    else if (output[i] == 1)
      printf("1 carry operation.\n");
    else
      printf("%d carry operations.\n", output[i]);
    i++;
  }
}

int main()
{
  unsigned int a, b;
  int carry, i;
  int output[1000];

  i = 0;
  while (scanf("%d %d", &a, &b)) {
    if ((a == 0) && (b == 0)) {
      output[i] = -1;
      break;
    }
    carry = num_carry_ops(a, b);
    output[i] = carry;
    i++;
  }

  print_output(output);

  return 0;
}
